column1: Section 4(1) sets out the documents that the plaintiff  shall file along with

column2: The institution suing shall on presenting the plaint, file with the plaint
an affidavit to the effect that the sum claimed is lawfully due to the
institution from the defendant, a draft decree nisi, the requisite stamps
for the decree nisi and for service thereof and shall in addition, file in

column1: court,  such  number  of  copies  of

column2: agreement or document sued upon, or relied on by the institution, as is

column1: equal to the number of defendants in the action.
